DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim of this study is to assess if patients with persistent GERD symptoms receiving sub-optimal omeprazole dosing experience improvement in GERD symptoms when prescribed an optimal dosing regimen. The optimal dosing regimen is defined as taking omeprazole 30 minutes prior to the first meal of the day.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Assessing Patient Satisfaction of Symptom Control With Proton Pump Inhibitor Dosing Regimen
